en: Japan disproved phony accusations of computer chip dumping.
zh: 日本驳斥了有关倾销电脑芯片的虚假指控。

en: Computers are really selling like hotcakes.
zh: 电脑现在卖得非常火爆。

en: It is an advantage to be able to use a computer.
zh: 能够使用电脑是一种优势。

en: Computers have changed the industrial picture considerably.
zh: 电脑已经极大地改变了工业格局。

en: My computer is out of order, and I have to get it repaired.
zh: 我的电脑坏了，我得拿去修理。

en: The computer broke down.
zh: 电脑死机了。

en: Computers are being introduced into this company.
zh: 这家公司正在引进电脑。

en: There is a labor shortage of computer programmers.
zh: 电脑程序员人手不足。

en: The computer system shuts down automatically at 8pm.
zh: 电脑系统在晚上8点自动关闭。

en: I am able to buy anything in a convenience store.
zh: 我可以在便利店买到任何东西。

en: Hi, George! How's it going?
zh: 你好，乔治！最近怎么样？

en: I'd like to drive across the USA in a convertible car.
zh: 我想开着敞篷车横穿美国。

en: Hi! I'm Ichirou Tanaka. Nice to meet you.
zh: 你好！我是田中一郎。很高兴认识你。

en: Hi! Thanks for flying with us. How are you today?
zh: 您好！感谢您乘坐我们的航班。今天感觉怎么样？

en: Hi! What is the purpose of your visit in America, sir?
zh: 您好！先生，您来美国的目的是什么？

en: Good day. How are you today?
zh: 您好。今天感觉怎么样？

en: Hi, Roger. I'm pretty good!
zh: 嗨，罗杰。我很好！

en: Hi, Mimi! How are you doing?
zh: 嗨，咪咪！你怎么样？

en: Hi, my name is Ken Saitou.
zh: 你好，我叫斋藤健。

en: Hi, Paul. Busy as usual?
zh: 嗨，保罗。还是一如既往地忙吗？

en: Hello, Tom.
zh: 你好，汤姆。

en: Hi, Susan. How are you?
zh: 嗨，苏珊。你好吗？

en: Hello. Are you Jackie Scott?
zh: 你好。你是杰基·斯科特吗？

en: Hi, how are you, everyone?
zh: 大家好，你们好吗？

en: Hi! Do you work here?
zh: 你好！你在这里工作吗？

en: Such extravagance is beyond my reach.
zh: 这种奢侈对我来说是遥不可及的。

en: I have no idea what he has in mind, rejecting such a favorable proposal.
zh: 我真不知道他怎么想的，竟然拒绝这么好的提议。

en: We might as well eat dog food as eat such a dish.
zh: 吃这种菜还不如吃狗粮。

en: He must be crazy to go out in this stormy weather.
zh: 在这种暴风雨天气出门，他一定是疯了。

en: I cannot entertain such a request.
zh: 我无法接受这样的请求。

en: What did they add this needless function for?
zh: 他们加这个多余的功能干什么？

en: Hey! I don't want any crank calls - not at this hour.
zh: 喂！我不想接到骚扰电话——都这个点了。

en: It is not safe for a girl to go out by herself so late at night.
zh: 这么晚了，女孩子一个人出门不安全。

en: What is the good of reading such books?
zh: 读这种书有什么用？

en: It is no use reading such a book.
zh: 读这种书没用。

en: I've never tasted anything as unusual as this.
zh: 我从来没尝过这么特别的东西。

en: You were thoughtful to remember me in this way.
zh: 你能这样想着我，真是有心了。

en: In this way, we waste a lot of time.
zh: 这样一来，我们就浪费了很多时间。

en: Do it this way.
zh: 就这样做。

en: This is the way he treated me.
zh: 他就是这样对待我的。

en: I can't put up with these insults.
zh: 我受不了这些侮辱。

en: Never have I read so terrifying a novel as this.
zh: 我从来没读过这么恐怖的小说。

en: Never have I seen such a beautiful sunset.
zh: 我从来没见过这么美丽的日落。

en: This is the prettiest sunset I have ever seen.
zh: 这是我见过的最美丽的日落。

en: Have you ever seen such a beautiful sunset?
zh: 你见过这么美丽的日落吗？

en: Do not read books in such a dim room.
zh: 不要在这么昏暗的房间里看书。

en: It's impossible to work in a room this dim.
zh: 在这么昏暗的房间里根本没法工作。

en: I don't feel like going out on such a day.
zh: 我不想在这样的日子出门。

en: Who'd have thought this is how the pieces fit?
zh: 谁能想到这些碎片是这样拼起来的？

en: I'd rather stay home than go out in this weather.
zh: 我宁愿待在家里，也不想在这种天气出门。

en: I have some doubts about his coming in this weather.
zh: 我对他这种天气来有点怀疑。

en: I am sorry to have kept you waiting so long.
zh: 很抱歉让你久等了。

en: Please excuse me for calling you so early in the morning.
zh: 请原谅我这么早给你打电话。

en: It may not be amiss to give this advice.
zh: 给这个建议也许没有坏处。

en: I can't afford to eat in such an expensive restaurant.
zh: 我负担不起在这么贵的餐厅吃饭。

en: Such a man cannot be relied upon.
zh: 这样的人是靠不住的。

en: This warm weather is abnormal for February.
zh: 这种温暖的天气对于二月来说是不正常的。

en: There's nothing to make such a fuss about.
zh: 没什么好大惊小怪的。

en: I've never had such a large sum of money.
zh: 我从来没有过这么大一笔钱。

en: Such a big gift is a white elephant to us.
zh: 这么大的礼物对我们来说是华而不实的东西。

en: You needn't have bought such a large house.
zh: 你本不必买这么大的房子。

en: It takes a lot of money to keep up such a big house.
zh: 维持这么大的房子需要很多钱。

en: I've never seen such a giant watermelon!
zh: 我从来没见过这么大的西瓜！

en: This is the largest temple that I've ever seen.
zh: 这是我见过的最大的寺庙。

en: How are you going to spend such a large amount of money?
zh: 你打算怎么花这么多钱？

en: We can not carry on conversation in such a noisy room.
zh: 我们不能在这么吵闹的房间里进行谈话。

en: You mustn't miss seeing this wonderful film.
zh: 你千万不要错过这部精彩的电影。

en: I've never been to such a nice party.
zh: 我从来没有参加过这么好的派对。

en: I never dreamed of there being such a quiet place.
zh: 我从来没有想到会有这么安静的地方。

en: I didn't foresee this turn of events.
zh: 我没有预料到会有这样的转变。

en: What on earth are you doing in such a lonely place?
zh: 你到底在这种荒凉的地方做什么？

en: I'm ashamed to go out dressed like this.
zh: 我不好意思穿成这样出门。

en: Where on earth do you suppose she is going in the dead of night?
zh: 你到底认为她会在半夜三更去哪里？

en: It is hard to get along on this small income.
zh: 靠这么少的收入很难维持生活。

en: Let's stop this fruitless discussion.
zh: 我们停止这种毫无结果的讨论吧。

en: I wanna get out of here!
zh: 我真想离开这儿！

en: You had better not walk around in such a place.
zh: 你最好不要在这种地方乱逛。

en: This is a daily occurrence.
zh: 这是家常便饭。

en: I can't stand being cooped up in this prison!
zh: 我受不了被关在这个监狱里！

en: Will I make it through?
zh: 我能挺过去吗？

en: It's about time we did away with this outdated law.
zh: 我们早就该废除这条过时的法律了。

en: I think it strange that there is no one on the street at this time of the day.
zh: 我觉得奇怪，一天中的这个时候街上竟然没有人。

en: Where on earth can he have gone off to at this time of day?
zh: 他到底在这个时候跑到哪里去了？

en: Such a judge should retire from his job before retirement age.
zh: 这样的法官应该在退休年龄前就辞职。

en: This is the worst thing that has ever happened to me!
zh: 这是我遇到过的最糟糕的事情！

en: You're crazy to buy such an expensive bike.
zh: 你买这么贵的自行车真是疯了。

en: I had no idea it would be such an expensive restaurant. I feel like I'm out of place.
zh: 我不知道这家餐厅这么贵。我觉得我格格不入。

en: You are an idiot to go out in this weather.
zh: 你这种天气出门真是个白痴。

en: I'd never seen such expansive scenery.
zh: 我从未见过如此广阔的景色。

en: Never have I been so happy.
zh: 我从来没有这么高兴过。

en: Don't let such a good opportunity go by.
zh: 不要让这么好的机会溜走。

en: Your parents are not to blame for such a result.
zh: 这样的结果不能怪你的父母。

en: I want to move out of this cramped room as soon as I can.
zh: 我想尽快搬出这个拥挤的房间。

en: I've never heard anything more dreadful.
zh: 我从来没听过这么可怕的事情。

en: We should do away with this regulation.
zh: 我们应该废除这项规定。

en: Did you ever hear of such a strange custom?
zh: 你听说过这么奇怪的习俗吗？

en: Who doesn't know such a simple proverb?
zh: 谁不知道这么简单的谚语？

en: I can't drink such sweet stuff.
zh: 我不能喝这么甜的东西。

en: This is the coldest weather in ten years.
zh: 这是十年来最冷的天气。

en: It's foolish for you to swim when it's this cold.
zh: 天气这么冷，你还游泳真是太傻了。

en: You'd better not go out in this cold weather.
zh: 这么冷的天，你最好别出门。

en: There is no going out on such a cold day.
zh: 这么冷的天，不宜出门。

en: I would rather stay at home than go out on such a cold day.
zh: 这么冷的天，我宁愿待在家里也不出门。

en: I don't like to go out without a coat on such a cold day.
zh: 这么冷的天，我不喜欢不穿外套就出门。

en: I look for all the world like an athlete in this outfit, but the truth is I don't do any sports at all.
zh: 我这身打扮看起来像个运动员，但实际上我根本不做任何运动。

en: Pardon me for being in this dress.
zh: 穿着这身衣服，请原谅。

en: Having this meeting isn't going to do the trick, is it?
zh: 开这个会恐怕解决不了问题，是吧？

en: I wouldn't dream of going on a picnic on such a rainy day.
zh: 下这么大的雨，我绝不会想去野餐。

en: We have no chance against those top players.
zh: 我们没有机会战胜那些顶尖选手。

en: I often stumble over something as I am blind as a bat in the dark.
zh: 我经常被东西绊倒，因为我在黑暗中就像一只瞎蝙蝠。

en: What do you need sunglasses for in such a dark place?
zh: 这么黑的地方，你戴太阳镜干什么？

en: You had better not go out in this bad weather.
zh: 这种糟糕的天气，你最好别出门。

en: There is no going out in this stormy weather.
zh: 这种暴风雨天气，不宜出门。

en: I can't get by on such a small income.
zh: 这么少的收入，我无法维持生计。

en: I feel like playing golf on such a lovely day.
zh: 在这么美好的日子里，我想去打高尔夫球。

en: You cannot expect such a good chance again.
zh: 你不可能再有这么好的机会了。

en: It's absolutely impossible for me to go on like this.
zh: 我绝对不可能再这样下去了。

en: I should not have bought such a thing.
zh: 我不该买这种东西。

en: I am glad I did not buy such a thing.
zh: 我很高兴我没有买这种东西。

en: I can do without this.
zh: 我不需要这个。

en: "Put this stuff away at once!" she yelled in a rage.
zh: “立刻把这些东西收起来！”她愤怒地喊道。

en: I've botched things up so bad I wish I could find a hole to climb into.
zh: 我把事情搞砸得太糟糕了，真希望我能找到一个洞钻进去。

en: It's so odd talking in the dark like this.
zh: 这样在黑暗中说话真奇怪。

en: I have a strong objection to being treated like this.
zh: 我强烈反对受到这样的对待。

en: This is the way in which it happened.
zh: 事情就是这样发生的。

en: This is how they catch an elephant alive.
zh: 他们就是这样活捉大象的。

en: This is how I made it.
zh: 我就是这样成功的。

en: This is how I solved the difficult problem.
zh: 我就是这样解决这个难题的。

en: This is how we reached the conclusion.
zh: 我们就是这样得出结论的。

en: This is the way in which we can become acquainted with one another.
zh: 这是我们互相认识的方式。

en: I would rather die than have such a terrible experience.
zh: 我宁愿死也不要经历这么可怕的事情。

en: Mother told me that I had better not go out in such bad weather.
zh: 妈妈告诉我，这么糟糕的天气我最好不要出门。

en: I'm ashamed to ask you such a silly question.
zh: 问你这么傻的问题，我很惭愧。

en: I hope it will be the only one.
zh: 我希望这是唯一的一次。

en: I've never seen anything like this before.
zh: 我以前从未见过这样的事情。

en: Never have I seen such a peaceful scene.
zh: 我从未见过如此宁静的景象。

en: I'm sorry to cause you all this trouble.
zh: 很抱歉给你们添了这么多麻烦。

en: I have seldom seen such a beautiful sunset as this.
zh: 我很少见到如此美丽的日落。

en: Never have I seen such a beautiful sight.
zh: 我从未见过如此美丽的景色。

en: Never have I seen such a beautiful picture.
zh: 我从未见过如此美丽的图画。

en: I'm sorry to have kept you waiting so long.
zh: 很抱歉让你们久等了。

en: I must apologize for not having written for such a long time.
zh: 我必须为这么久没写信道歉。

en: I've never seen a pearl of such magnitude!
zh: 我从未见过这么大的珍珠！

en: How can I work with all these papers everywhere?
zh: 到处都是这些文件，我怎么工作啊？

en: More people came to the party than I had bargained for.
zh: 来参加聚会的人比我预想的要多。

en: Jobs are hard to come by with so many people out of work.
zh: 这么多人失业，工作很难找。

en: Anyone would find it hard to run on such a hot day.
zh: 在这么炎热的天气里，谁都会觉得跑步很困难。

en: This intense heat doesn't seem to bother you.
zh: 这种酷热似乎并没有困扰你。

en: How am I to pay such a debt?
zh: 我该如何偿还这笔债务呢？

en: There is no going out on such a stormy day.
zh: 在这样暴风雨的天气里，是不能外出的。

en: With it raining like this, we'll never be able to leave.
zh: 下这么大的雨，我们根本没法走了。

en: Death is preferable to such suffering.
zh: 与其这样受苦，不如死了算了。

en: This is the first time I've seen such a dreadful movie.
zh: 这是我第一次看这么糟糕的电影。

en: I haven't had such a good time in years.
zh: 我已经好几年没这么开心过了。

en: It's convenient living so close to the station.
zh: 住在离车站这么近的地方真方便。

en: This pen is a real bargain at such a low price.
zh: 这支笔价格这么低，真是太划算了。

en: You should not climb the mountain in such bad weather.
zh: 在这种恶劣的天气下，你不应该爬山。

en: This is the most exciting book that I have ever read.
zh: 这是我读过的最激动人心的书。

en: I had no idea it'd be this beautiful.
zh: 我没想到这里会这么漂亮。

en: It is bad of me to have kept you waiting so long.
zh: 我让你等了这么久，真是不好意思。

en: You have all these books!
zh: 你有这么多书啊！

en: I'm really glad to have had such an enjoyable time.
zh: 我真的很高兴能度过这么愉快的时光。

en: What a good scholar the author must be to write such a splendid book!
zh: 作者一定是位大学问家，才能写出这么精彩的书！

en: You mustn't miss such a good opportunity.
zh: 你千万不要错过这么好的机会。

en: I'm really happy to have had such a great time.
zh: 我真的很高兴能度过这么美好的时光。

en: I'm sorry to trouble you so much.
zh: 真不好意思，这么麻烦你。

en: I had no idea it would put you to so much trouble.
zh: 我没想到会给你带来这么多麻烦。

en: She must be kind-hearted to send you such a pretty doll.
zh: 她一定是心地善良，才会送你这么漂亮的娃娃。

en: Never have I read such an interesting story.
zh: 我从来没有读过这么有趣的故事。

en: I've never eaten anything as delicious as this.
zh: 我从来没吃过这么好吃的东西。

en: Have you ever listened to such a good music?
zh: 你听过这么好听的音乐吗？

en: You had better not wander around here by yourself.
zh: 你最好不要一个人在这里闲逛。

en: I never expected this fine hotel to be found in such a place.
zh: 我从没想过在这种地方能找到这么好的酒店。

en: Fancy meeting you here!
zh: 真想不到会在这里遇见你！

en: Never did I dream that I would meet you here.
zh: 我做梦也没想到会在这里遇见你。

en: Fancy meeting you here.
zh: 真巧，竟然在这里碰到你。

en: He said he wanted to put an end to such a trifle.
zh: 他说他想结束这种小事。

en: I'm sick of this hand-to-mouth existence.
zh: 我厌倦了这种勉强糊口的生活。

en: I never saw such a splendid sunset.
zh: 我从没见过这么壮丽的日落。

en: Who wants to be cooped up indoors on a nice day like this?
zh: 谁愿意在这么好的天气里被关在室内？

en: I hope this fine weather holds.
zh: 我希望这好天气能持续下去。

en: You must not miss seeing this wonderful film.
zh: 你一定不要错过这部精彩的电影。

en: Did you ever see such a film?
zh: 你见过这样的电影吗？

en: I've never seen a shot like that.
zh: 我从没见过那样的射门。

en: It is very kind of you to send me such a nice present.
zh: 你送我这么好的礼物，真是太好了。

en: You may not believe this, but I don't drink at all.
zh: 你可能不相信，但我一点都不喝酒。

en: This is the first time.
zh: 这是第一次。

en: He must be stupid to believe such a thing.
zh: 他一定是傻瓜才会相信这种事。

en: Have you ever heard of such a thing?
zh: 你听说过这种事吗？

en: He must be a fool to do such a thing.
zh: 他一定是傻瓜才会做这种事。

en: It was foolish of him to do such a thing.
zh: 他做这种事真是太傻了。

en: Will you give me your reasons for doing this?
zh: 请你告诉我你做这件事的理由。

en: Please accept what little comfort these words can give you.
zh: 请接受这些话语所能带给你的微薄安慰。

en: You might not believe what I'm about to tell you, so don't be surprised.
zh: 你可能不相信我接下来要说的话，所以不要惊讶。

en: This is totally unacceptable.
zh: 这完全不能接受。

en: I never thought it would wind up like this.
zh: 我从没想过事情会变成这样。

en: I'm sorry it worked out this way.
zh: 我很抱歉事情会变成这样。

en: See to it that this never happens again.
zh: 确保这种事再也不会发生。

en: Such a thing can't happen in Japan.
zh: 这种事不可能在日本发生。

en: Even this cable cost me 6000 yen.
zh: 就连这根电缆也花了我6000日元。

en: I don't dare ask such a silly question.
zh: 我都不好意思问这么傻的问题。

en: It is criminal to pay so much money for such trifles.
zh: 花这么多钱买这些小玩意儿简直是犯罪。

en: Never did I see such a beautiful sunset.
zh: 我从未见过如此美丽的日落。

en: I can't stand an awful sweat like this.
zh: 我受不了这种糟糕的汗水。

en: Such playfulness is characteristic of Mr Baker.
zh: 这种顽皮是贝克先生的特点。

en: Have you ever tasted such a good soup?
zh: 你尝过这么好喝的汤吗？

en: Such treatment would make anybody rebel.
zh: 这样的待遇会让人反抗的。

en: It's a pity for you to have to stay indoors in this weather.
zh: 在这种天气里你不得不待在室内真是太可惜了。

en: Condors have never bred in zoos.
zh: 秃鹰从未在动物园里繁殖过。

en: Whose turn is it next?
zh: 接下来轮到谁了？

en: This time I'll try it.
zh: 这次我来试试。

en: I am to visit my uncle in Shizuoka next Sunday.
zh: 下周日我要去静冈拜访我的叔叔。

en: What are you going to do next Sunday?
zh: 下周日你打算做什么？

en: You must put up with your new post for the present.
zh: 目前你必须忍受你的新职位。

en: Prizes will be awarded at the end of the contest.
zh: 比赛结束时将颁发奖品。

en: I'm looking for my contact lens.
zh: 我在找我的隐形眼镜。

en: May I have a pair of contact lenses?
zh: 我可以要一副隐形眼镜吗？

en: I fell asleep with my contacts in.

en: This feels soft and smooth.
zh: 这感觉柔软光滑。

en: This is an interesting case where there is no principal determining element.
zh: 这是一个有趣的案例，没有主要的决定性因素。

en: This is a great time-saving gadget for the housewife.
zh: 这是家庭主妇节省时间的好工具。

en: This tree is too young to bear fruit.
zh: 这棵树太年轻了，不能结果。

en: This is a car for young people.
zh: 这是一辆为年轻人设计的汽车。

en: This is a problem for young people to solve.
zh: 这是一个需要年轻人解决的问题。

en: This is a map which will be useful when traveling by car.
zh: 这是一张地图，自驾游时会很有用。

en: This is the spitting image of the real thing, perfectly true to life.
zh: 这简直和真的一模一样，完全栩栩如生。

en: This is in effect less expensive than that.
zh: 实际上，这比那个更便宜。

en: This is an actual happening.
zh: 这是一件真实发生的事情。

en: This is too good a chance to miss.
zh: 这是一个千载难逢的机会，不容错过。

en: This is the job of my own choice.
zh: 这是我自己的选择的工作。

en: This is an automatic door.
zh: 这是自动门。

en: This is homemade jam.
zh: 这是自制果酱。

en: I'd like to take this with me.
zh: 我想把这个带走。

en: You can't bring this in.
zh: 你不能把这个带进来。

en: This is based on fact.
zh: 这是基于事实的。

en: This is a fact, not a fiction.
zh: 这是事实，不是虚构。

en: This is a product of our own creative activity.
zh: 这是我们自己创造性活动的产物。

en: This is too small a house for us to live in.
zh: 这房子太小了，我们住不下。

en: This is beyond the compass of my ability.
zh: 这超出了我的能力范围。

en: This is quite contrary to what I want.
zh: 这和我想要的完全相反。

en: This is little different from what I want.
zh: 这和我想要的几乎没有什么不同。

en: This is one of the jobs I have to do every day.
zh: 这是我每天必须做的工作之一。

en: This is a picture of my sister.
zh: 这是我妹妹的照片。

en: Here is the fish my mother baked.
zh: 这是我妈妈烤的鱼。

en: This is the village where my father was born.
zh: 这是我父亲出生的村庄。

en: This is beyond the scope of my imagination.
zh: 这超出了我的想象范围。

en: This is the chance of a lifetime.
zh: 这是千载难逢的机会。

en: This was my first visit to a foreign country.
zh: 这是我第一次访问外国。

en: This is my account book.
zh: 这是我的账本。

en: This is my bicycle.
zh: 这是我的自行车。

en: This is my dictionary.
zh: 这是我的词典。

en: This isn't my umbrella; it's somebody else's.
zh: 这不是我的伞，是别人的。

en: This is just the way I like it done.
zh: 我就喜欢这样做。

en: This isn't my bag.
zh: 这不是我的包。

en: This is my desk.
zh: 这是我的桌子。

en: This will be a good opportunity for me to use my language skills to my advantage.
zh: 这对我来说是个好机会，可以利用我的语言技能来发挥我的优势。

en: This is a picture of my family.
zh: 这是我家的照片。

en: This isn't mine.
zh: 这不是我的。

en: This is the same bicycle as mine.
zh: 这辆自行车和我的一样。

en: This is my coat, and that is my father's.
zh: 这是我的外套，那是我的父亲的。

en: This is my bag.
zh: 这是我的包。

en: This is the house where my uncle lives.
zh: 这是我叔叔住的房子。

en: This was to teach me to think methodically.
zh: 这是为了教我系统地思考。

en: This enables me to see and face my present trouble.
zh: 这使我能够看到并面对我目前的困境。

en: This taught me a good lesson.
zh: 这给了我一个很好的教训。

en: This is above me.
zh: 这我做不来。

en: This didn't fit me very well.
zh: 这个不太适合我。

en: This is a proverb the meaning of which I don't know.
zh: 这是一句我不知道意思的谚语。

en: This is the outcome of our research.
zh: 这是我们研究的结果。

en: This is something we cannot do without.
zh: 这是我们不能缺少的东西。

en: This is the theater where we see foreign movies.
zh: 这是我们看外国电影的剧院。

en: Here is a present for you in token of our appreciation.
zh: 这是送给你的礼物，以表达我们的感谢。

en: I am not alone in this opinion.
zh: 我不是唯一持有这种观点的人。

en: This is what I wanted.
zh: 这就是我想要的。

en: This is the same camera that I lost.
zh: 这和我丢的那台相机一样。

en: This is the dictionary I use every day.
zh: 这是我每天用的字典。
